column4: Anyone come across an issue where a user cannot log in? It's credentials are fine as I can su to it but it won't log in, just returns to the log in screen without error. I've removed Xauthority and chowned it back to itself but still no luck.
came across exact problem before, while giving wireshark non-root user access, bump into an error and all my user accounts cannot login to the desktop, had to re-install the 12.04
hmmm surely it's just a permission error or something somewhere but nothing obvious that I can find.
seems like it, the error occured while I was setting permission for wireshark
